cars.name: Jaguar F-Type R
cars.body: Winter driving can present a real challenge. Whether you’re an experienced snow pro or a freshly licensed driver dealing with freezing conditions for the first time, if you live in an area where the weather turns treacherous four months out of the year, you’ve no doubt experienced more than a little frustration with winter out on the roads.
